languages.text: "Быть может, знаки, что разобрала я, не смогли убедить тебя. Я молю богов, что иные, более понятные тебе свидетельства сумеют склонить твое мнение в иную сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, знаки, что разобрала я, не смогли убедить тебя. Я молю богов, что иные, более понятные тебе свидетельства сумеют склонить твое мнение в иную сторону".

languages.text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, знаки, что разобрала я, не смогли убедить тебя. Я молю богов, что иные, более понятные тебе свидетельства сумеют склонить твое мнение в иную сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."
"Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."
"Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."
"Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

languages.text: 「我が見つけた兆しでは納得してもらえなかった、ということか。では神に祈ろう、他の証拠で…もっと分かりやすい何かで…あなたの考えを動かせるように」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

traits.locale_text: 「我が見つけた兆しでは納得してもらえなかった、ということか。では神に祈ろう、他の証拠で…もっと分かりやすい何かで…あなたの考えを動かせるように」

languages.text: “或许我看到的迹象无法说服你。我向诸神祈祷，希望我们能找到其他证据，找到更能让你们理解的证据，来改变你的观点。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

traits.locale_text: “或许我看到的迹象无法说服你。我向诸神祈祷，希望我们能找到其他证据，找到更能让你们理解的证据，来改变你的观点。”

languages.text: «Quizá las señales que he descubierto no te convenzan. Rezo a los dioses para que encontremos otras pruebas, algo que alcances a comprender, para disuadirte de tu opinión».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

traits.locale_text: «Quizá las señales que he descubierto no te convenzan. Rezo a los dioses para que encontremos otras pruebas, algo que alcances a comprender, para disuadirte de tu opinión».

languages.text: "Anscheinend haben die von mir entdeckten Zeichen Euch nicht überzeugt. Ich bete zu den Göttern, dass andere Beweise – die ihr besser versteht – Eure Meinung ändern werden."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend haben die von mir entdeckten Zeichen Euch nicht überzeugt. Ich bete zu den Göttern, dass andere Beweise – die ihr besser versteht – Eure Meinung ändern werden."

languages.text: « Les signes que j'ai découverts n'ont peut-être pas suffi à vous convaincre. Je prie les dieux pour que d'autres preuves plus à la mesure de votre compréhension soient mises au jour afin de vous faire changer d'avis. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

traits.locale_text: « Les signes que j'ai découverts n'ont peut-être pas suffi à vous convaincre. Je prie les dieux pour que d'autres preuves plus à la mesure de votre compréhension soient mises au jour afin de vous faire changer d'avis. »

languages.text: "Ortaya çıkardığım işaretlerden ikna olmadın belli ki. Umarım tanrılar lütfeder de fikrini değiştirecek, daha anlaşılır bir kanıt çıkar karşına."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the signs I uncovered have failed to convince you. I pray to the gods that other proof — something more comprehensible to you — will emerge to sway your opinion."

traits.locale_text: "Ortaya çıkardığım işaretlerden ikna olmadın belli ki. Umarım tanrılar lütfeder de fikrini değiştirecek, daha anlaşılır bir kanıt çıkar karşına."
